page.title: 13LANDSCAPE IN BILSTHORPE
page.content: The first the people of Bilsthorpe heard of the landfill scheme was when they were invited to a meeting at the Junior School. Despite great opposition by many of the population, including meetings and petitions the Notts. County Council have gone ahead with the plan. An old brickyard is to be filled with household rubbish from other areas. The main oppositions were the sight of the dump, but this should be screened from view from all sides by landscaping and tree planting. High fencing should stop the rubbish blowing all over. With the high volume of lorries coming to the tip a major new roundabout is being constructed. There will be a footpath from Bilsthorpe to Farnsfield along the old railway line.
